name: Shoot Em Up Spaceship!
description:
Control your spaceship as you try to survive the onslaught of alien hordes and bosses! Try to survive the longest and get the highest score! This game was made in 48 hours for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam (GMTK Jam)

FEATURES

One Unique Boss and Enemy

Endless Waves

GENRE

Shoot em up (SHMUP)

CONTROLS

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Mouse to click menu buttons

Quick tip, use fullscreen!
